description:
When fighting injustice, sometimes our silence speaks more powerful than words.
—
Today, as a wave of calculated propaganda circulates social media and sponsored medical professionals regurgitate one-liners, I will be observing a moment of silence. —
For every baby who never woke up... For every person injured and ignored... For every child who’s voice was taken... For every child they won’t let in school...
— “It is difficult to get a man to understand something when his salary depends upon his not understanding it.” Upton Sinclair
#trumphelpus #nonewnormal #saynotobillgates
